instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 1 oz Campari.
Add 1 oz Sweet Vermouth.
Top with club soda.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Add 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Apricot Brandy, and 1 oz Calvados to a shaker.
Fill shaker with ice and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Add 2 oz White Rum, 1 oz Lime Juice, and 1 tsp Sugar to a shaker.
Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Add 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Green Chartreuse, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, and 1 dash Orange Bitters to a mixing glass.
Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.
Add 1 oz Brandy, 1 oz Crème de Cacao, and 1 oz Heavy Cream to a shaker.
Shake with ice until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 2 oz Dark Rum.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
Add 1 oz Galliano, 1 oz Triple Sec, 1 oz Orange Juice, and 1 oz Cream to a shaker.
Add ice and shake until chilled.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour 5 oz chilled white wine into a glass.
Add 0.5 oz Crème de Cassis.
Stir gently.
Pour 5 oz Champagne into a flute glass.
Add 0.5 oz Crème de Cassis.
Stir gently.
Add 0.75 oz each Gin, Green Chartreuse, Maraschino Liqueur, and Lime Juice to a shaker.
Shake with ice until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Rub lemon wedge around the rim of a glass and dip in sugar to coat.
Add 2 oz Vodka, 1 oz Lemon Juice, and 0.5 oz Triple Sec to a shaker.
Shake with ice and strain into the glass.
Add 2 oz Rye Whiskey, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, and 2 dashes Angostura Bitters to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Rub lime wedge around rim of glass and dip in salt.
Add 2 oz Tequila, 1 oz Triple Sec, and 1 oz Lime Juice to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into prepared glass.
Add 2 oz Gin and 0.5 oz Dry Vermouth to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with lemon twist or olive.
Pour 2 oz chilled orange juice into a flute glass.
Top with 3 oz Champagne.
Stir gently.
Rinse a chilled glass with absinthe and discard excess.
In a mixing glass, muddle sugar with Peychaud's bitters.
Add 2 oz rye whiskey and ice.
Stir until chilled.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 1.5 oz vodka.
Add 3 oz cranberry juice and 1 oz grapefruit juice.
Stir gently.
Rub the rim of a glass with lemon and dip in sugar.
Add 2 oz cognac, 1 oz triple sec, and 0.75 oz lemon juice to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Fill a glass with ice.
Add 2 oz tequila and 4 oz orange juice.
Slowly pour 0.5 oz grenadine, allowing it to settle.
Do not stir.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Add 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, and 0.5 oz sugar syrup to a shaker.
Add ice and shake.
Strain into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry.
Add 3 oz gin, 1 oz vodka, and 0.5 oz Lillete Blanc to a shaker.
Add ice and shake until well chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.
Add 2 oz bourbon, 1 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz sugar syrup, and optional egg white to a shaker.
Dry shake (without ice) to emulsify egg white.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a rocks glass with ice.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka and 1 oz coffee liqueur.
Top with cream and stir gently.
Add 1 oz gin, 1 oz dark crème de cacao, and 1 oz heavy cream to a shaker.
Add ice and shake until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.
Add 2 oz gin, 0.5 oz maraschino liqueur, 0.75 oz lemon juice, and 0.25 oz crème de violette to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Layer 1 part Kahlúa, 1 part Baileys Irish Cream, and 1 part Grand Marnier in a shot glass.
Pour each ingredient slowly over the back of a spoon to create layers.
Add 1 oz dark rum, 1 oz light rum, 1 oz grenadine, 2 oz orange juice, and 2 oz pineapple juice to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into a tall glass filled with ice.
Add 1 oz cognac, 1 oz light rum, 1 oz triple sec, and 0.75 oz lemon juice to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka and 1 oz coffee liqueur.
Stir gently.
Fill a tall glass with ice.
Add 1.5 oz vodka, 3 oz tomato juice, 0.5 oz lemon juice.
Add 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce, 2 dashes Tabasco, pinch of celery salt and pepper.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a celery stick.
Rim a glass with sugar.
Add 2 oz brandy, 0.5 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz maraschino liqueur, 0.25 oz sugar syrup, and 2 dashes Angostura bitters to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon peel.
Cut lime into wedges and muddle with 2 tsp sugar in a glass.
Fill glass with ice.
Add 2 oz cachaça and stir well.
Place a sugar cube in a champagne flute.
Add 2-3 dashes Angostura bitters on the sugar cube.
Fill glass with chilled champagne.
Garnish with a lemon peel.
Add 0.75 oz gin, 0.75 oz cointreau, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.75 oz Lillet Blanc to shaker.
Add ice and shake until chilled.
Rinse glass with absinthe and strain mixture into it.
Add 1.5 oz vodka, 1 oz triple sec, 0.5 oz cranberry juice, and 0.5 oz lime juice to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Add 2 oz white rum, 1 oz lime juice, and 0.75 oz sugar syrup to a shaker.
Add ice and shake until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Add 2 oz gin and 0.5 oz dry vermouth to a mixing glass with ice.
Stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with lemon twist or olive.
Add 1 oz gin, 0.5 oz lemon juice, and 0.5 oz sugar syrup to shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Add 2 oz gin, 0.75 oz lime juice, and 0.75 oz simple syrup to a shaker.
Add ice and shake until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 1.5 oz Scotch whisky and 1.5 oz amaretto.
Stir gently.
Add 1 oz green crème de menthe, 1 oz white crème de cacao, and 1 oz cream to shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into cocktail glass.
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka.
Top with grapefruit juice.
Stir gently.
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 2 oz brandy.
Top with ginger ale.
Garnish with a long lemon peel twist.
Pour hot coffee into a glass.
Add 1.5 oz Irish whiskey and 1 tsp sugar.
Stir until sugar dissolves.
Top with lightly whipped cream.
Add 2 oz whiskey, 1 oz lemon juice, and 0.5 oz sugar syrup to a shaker.
Shake with ice.
Strain into a tall glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with lemon slice and cherry.
Add 1 oz light rum, 1 oz dark rum, 0.5 oz orange curacao, 0.75 oz lime juice, 0.5 oz orgeat syrup, and 0.25 oz sugar syrup to a shaker.
Shake with ice.
Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
Muddle 2 sprigs of mint with 0.25 oz sugar syrup and a splash of water in a glass.
Fill glass with crushed ice.
Add 2 oz bourbon.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a mint sprig.
Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice in a glass.
Add ice and 2 oz white rum.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a sprig of mint.
Add 1 oz gin, 1 oz sweet vermouth, and 1 oz Campari to a mixing glass.
Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange peel.
Place sugar cube in a rocks glass.
Add 2-3 dashes Angostura bitters and a splash of water.
Muddle until sugar dissolves.
Fill glass with ice and add 2 oz bourbon or rye whiskey.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange peel.
Rub the rim of a glass with lime and dip in salt.
Add ice to the glass.
Pour 2 oz tequila and 1 oz lime juice.
Top with grapefruit soda.
Stir gently.
Add 2 oz white rum, 1 oz coconut cream, and 3 oz pineapple juice to a blender.
Add ice and blend until smooth.
Pour into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.
Add 2 oz Scotch whisky, 1 oz sweet vermouth, and 2 dashes Angostura bitters to a mixing glass.
Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 2 oz Scotch whisky and 1 oz Drambuie.
Stir gently.
Fill a large wine glass with ice.
Add 3 oz Prosecco, 2 oz Aperol, and a splash of soda water.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Add 1 oz bourbon or rye whiskey, 1 oz sweet vermouth, and 1 oz Campari to a mixing glass.
Add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.
Cut lime into wedges and muddle with 2 tsp sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka and stir well.
Add 2 oz gin, 0.75 oz lemon juice, 0.5 oz raspberry syrup, and 1 egg white to a shaker.
Dry shake (without ice) to emulsify egg white.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 1.5 oz cognac and 1.5 oz amaretto.
Stir gently.
Fill a rocks glass with ice.
Add 1.5 oz vodka and 1.5 oz amaretto.
Stir gently.
Add 2 oz white rum, 0.5 oz maraschino liqueur, 1 oz grapefruit juice, 0.5 oz lime juice, and 0.25 oz sugar syrup to a shaker.
Add ice and shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Add 1 oz white rum, 1 oz dark rum, 0.5 oz orange curacao, 0.75 oz lime juice, and 0.5 oz orgeat syrup to a shaker.
Shake with ice.
Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish as desired.
Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka and 0.5 oz lime juice.
Top with ginger beer.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
